source.oracleReaderQuery:
Select OBJECT_NAME 
FROM ALL_OBJECTS 
WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN (
'ATEL_ACCOUNTSELECTION'
,'ATEL_BOOKSTRUCTURE'
,'ATEL_POSTINGPARAMETER'
,'SDKCLIENTS'
,'SDKCURRENCIES'
,'SDKDETAILSCOPES'
,'SDKLOVS'
,'SDKLOVVALUES'
,'SDKMATURITYRULES'
,'SDKSYSTEMPARAMETERS'
,'SDKUNITS'
,'SDKUSERLOVVALUES'
,'SDKUSERS'
,'SD_ANLAGEN'
,'SD_ANLAGENTYPEN'
,'SD_ANSCHRIFTEN'
,'SD_BELEGTYPEN'
,'SD_BILLMARKET'
,'SD_BUSINESSAREAS'
,'SD_DETAILPROPERTIES'
,'SD_DETAILS'
,'SD_DETAILTYPES'
,'SD_DOMAINWERTE'
,'SD_FIBU'
,'SD_HOLIDAYS'
,'SD_HOLIDAYZONE'
,'SD_KONTAKTE'
,'SD_KUNDEN'
,'SD_LOVVALUE'
,'SD_MANDANTEN'
,'SD_PERSONEN'
,'SD_POSTINGTYPE'
,'SD_RECHNUNGEN'
,'SD_RECHNUNGSPOS'
,'SD_TAXCODE'
,'SD_TRADECONTRACT'
,'SD_TRADECONTRACTDET'
,'SD_USER'
,'SD_VERTRAEGE'
,'SD_VERTRAGSGRUPPEN'
,'SD_VERTRAGSTYPEN'
,'SD_WAEHRUNGEN'
,'ALPIQ_SCHEDULE_MAPPING'
) 
AND OWNER = 'PS_ADMIN'

select * from ET3000.PROGFP_ID
where trunc(last_update) > to_date('2020-07-07 16-00-00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS') and trunc(last_update) <= to_date('2020-07-08 16-00-00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS')

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'SELECT 
COLUMN_NAME
, DATA_TYPE
, DATA_TYPE_MOD
, DATA_TYPE_OWNER
, DATA_LENGTH
, DATA_PRECISION
, DATA_SCALE
, NULLABLE
, COLUMN_ID
, DEFAULT_LENGTH
, DATA_DEFAULT
, CHARACTER_SET_NAME
, CHAR_COL_DECL_LENGTH
, QUALIFIED_COL_NAME
FROM ALL_TAB_COLS
WHERE 
COLUMN_NAME NOT LIKE(''','SYS_%',''') AND
TABLE_NAME =''',
variables('table')
, ''' '
)

activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from Azure SQL database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT' and TABLE_NAME <> 'ProductModel'

activities.name: Copy data for each table in lookup
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select DISTINCT(OBJECT_NAME)
from ALL_OBJECTS 
WHERE OBJECT_NAME 
IN (
'DLV_PHYS_JOIN_LOCATION_VW'
,'DLV_PHYS_JOIN_PFOLIO_VW'
,'DLV_PHYS_PROF_KEY_DBF'
)

activities.name: Copy data for each SCN group
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT /*+ NO_PARALLEL("', variables('tableName'),'") */  * FROM ',variables('tableName'),' WHERE ORA_ROWSCN BETWEEN ', item().STARTING_VALUE, ' AND ',item().ENDING_VALUE)

@concat('select
CASE
  WHEN grp_nbr = 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn)
  WHEN grp_nbr > 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
  END as Starting_Value
, max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
, count(*)        as Total_Records
, grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(8) over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ',variables('tableName') ,'
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC')

activities.name: Copy data for each SCN group
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT /*+ NO_PARALLEL("', variables('tableName'),'") */  * FROM ',variables('tableName'),' WHERE ORA_ROWSCN BETWEEN ', item().STARTING_VALUE, ' AND ',item().ENDING_VALUE)

@concat('select
CASE
  WHEN grp_nbr = 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn)
  WHEN grp_nbr > 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
  END as Starting_Value
, max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
, count(*)        as Total_Records
, grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(8) over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ',variables('tableName') ,'
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC')
@concat('select ceil((select count(*) from ',variables('tableName'),')/8000000) as group_no from dual')

@concat('select
CASE
  WHEN grp_nbr = 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn)
  WHEN grp_nbr > 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
  END as Starting_Value
, max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
, count(*)        as Total_Records
, grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(',variables('numberOfGroups') ,') over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ',variables('tableName') ,'
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC')
@concat('SELECT /*+ NO_PARALLEL("', variables('tableName'),'") */  * FROM ',variables('tableName'),' WHERE ORA_ROWSCN BETWEEN ', item().STARTING_VALUE, ' AND ',item().ENDING_VALUE)

query.value:
@concat('select 
LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_RUN_CLOSING
from SHARED.EXTR_LAST_RUN_INFO
WHERE JOB_NAME = ''',pipeline().Pipeline,'''')

value.value:
@if(
equals(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,NULL)
,NULL
,formatDateTime(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'))

activities.name: Copy data for each SCN group
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'select
CASE
WHEN grp_nbr = 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn)
WHEN grp_nbr > 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
END as Starting_Value
,   max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
,   count(*)        as Total_Records
,   grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(8) over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ', 
variables('table'), 
' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_'' || TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >''',
variables('lastRunTimestamp'), 
''' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ''', formatDateTime(variables('extractionTimestamp'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'), ''')
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC'
)

Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select OBJECT_NAME from ALL_OBJECTS WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN (
'ALPIQ_ACT_LSWAP_REP'
,'ALPIQ_DELTA_EXPO_REP'
,'ALPIQ_DLT_EXP_FX_REP'
,'ALPIQ_MTM_LSWAP_VW'
,'ATEL_CMAT_REP'
,'ATEL_CS_ACT_PROV_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_TP_REP'
,'CS_ACTUALS_CER_REP')
AND OWNER = 'MX_DATAMART'
AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE'

activities.name: Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'select * from ', 
item().OBJECT_NAME, 
' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_'' || TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >''',
variables('lastRunTimestamp'), 
''' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ''', formatDateTime(variables('extractionTimestamp'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'), ''')'
)

query.value:
@concat('select 
LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_RUN_CLOSING
from SHARED.EXTR_LAST_RUN_INFO
WHERE JOB_NAME = ''',pipeline().Pipeline,'''')

value.value:

equals(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,NULL)
,NULL
,formatDateTime(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'))

variables('lastRunTimestamp'),
